name: Saints' Balm
desc: This luminescent paste is made from the powdered bones of a long-forgotten saint, mixed with herbs and blessed by a priest. It typically comes in a tightly sealed, palm-sized dish etched with holy symbols. Applying saints' balm to yourself or a creature within reach restores |dice=3d8 + 10| 3d8+10 Hit Points to the creature to which it's applied.
sourceBook: Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God
inputRequired: Restore |dice=3d8 + 10| 3d8+10 Hit Points to a creature within reach.
